name: market for impact extrusion of aluminium, cold, tempering | impact extrusion of aluminium, cold, tempering | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5307/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'impact extrusion of aluminium, cold, tempering', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is delivering the service of 'impact extrusion of aluminium, cold, tempering'. Impact extrusion is a manufacturing process that the product is made out of metal slug. It is a type of pressure forming that take advantage of the change in hardness of materials under high pressure.  To further strengthen and harden the extruded metal, tempering process is used via quenching (cooling), heat treatment, and/or cold working techniques. This process represents the tempering of 1 kg aluminium and it is considered as an integral part of the cold impact extrusion dataset. It only includes the energy consumption for the heat treatment of the aluminium after it has been deformed by impact extrusion.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/25:Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment/259:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products; metalworking service activit/2591:Forging, pressing, stamping and roll-forming of metal; powder metallurgy
